<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->Note to reviewers: This pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #12775 (Integration of property based testing into Bitcoin Core by Christewart)
* #8469 ([POC] Introducing property based testing to Core by Christewart)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the
Concept ACK. Just be careful to check how this interacts with #13604.
